SEARCH
Package src.UserPackage.ObserverPackage

Interface FollowerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
User
public interface FollowerInterface
The FollowerInterface defines an object that can follow Posters and be updated when they post a message. This acts as the Observer of our Observer pattern
Version:
1.0
Author:
George Matta

      Follows a Poster

      Updates this Follower with the post that a Poster made

      message - The message posted by the Poster
